cividi.description_html: ⚠️ Consult the README for warnings about using and building on this data. Also review Why It’s So Freaking Hard To Make A Good COVID-19 Model and Ten Considerations Before You Create Another Chart About COVID-19.

ch_municipalities.description_html: This repository compiles tools to generate a Frictionless Data compliant Datapackage of the current Swiss municipalities in CSV, JSON and GeoJSON formats.
ch_municipalities.source: Swiss Federal Office of Topography, swissBOUNDARIES3D
